original_text: All in whose nostrils was the breath of life, of all that was in the dry land, died.
korean_text: 육지에 있어 그 코에 생명의 기운의 숨이 있는 것은 다 죽었더라

sentences.original_text: All in whose nostrils was the breath of life
sentences.korean_translation: 그 콧속에 생명의 숨결이 있던 모든 것

sentences.original_text: of all that was in the dry land
